Control Name: Restricts Access—The types of activities that can occur through a communication channel (for example, FTP site, router port) are restricted.

control_attributes.Control: Restricts Access—The types of activities that can occur through a communication channel (for example, FTP site, router port) are restricted.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.6  The entity implements logical access security measures to protect against threats from sources outside its system boundaries.
